name: Rybbit
description: Rybbit is the modern open source and privacy friendly alternative to Google Analytics. It provides comprehensive web and product analytics including sessions, unique users, pageviews, bounce rate, session duration, session replays, customizable goals, retention, user journeys, funnels dashboards, advanced filtering across 15+ dimensions, custom events with JSON properties, 3-level location tracking with advanced map visualizations, real-time dashboard, and support for organizations with unlimited sites. It is cookieless and privacy friendly.
author: rybbit-io

form_fields.label: Disable Signup
form_fields.hint: Disable new user registration after initial setup

form_fields.label: Mapbox Token
form_fields.hint: Optional Mapbox API token for advanced map visualizations
